import Head from 'next/head' import { useState } from 'react' import classnames from 'classnames' import styles from './styles.module.scss' import { useUpdateEffect } from '' import Navigation from '@/components/Navigation' import Footer from '@/components/Footer' const MainLayout = ({ children, meta: { title, keywords, description } }) => { useUpdateEffect(() => { window.scroll({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' }) }, [current, pageSize]) const [menuActive, setMenuActive] = useState(false) const toggleMenu = () => setMenuActive(!menuActive) return <> {title && `${title} | `}SHOW&NEWS
{children}
} export default MainLayout
